messages.subject: New series of Shinsengumi figures by Furuta
messages.msgSnippet: http://homepage3.nifty.com/TeamWakamatsu/ They have produced already the series Ikedaya. ( see the photos below), and the new series will be available from
messages.messageBody:
http://homepage3.nifty.com/TeamWakamatsu/

They have produced already the series Ikedaya. ( see the photos below), and
the new series will be available from September 13 in Japan.

This time the series called,"Shinsensgumi Senjoroku"( Shinsengumi records of
the battles), including for exempla Serizawa Kamo at Yamatoya, Kondo Isami at
Ikedaya, Hjikata at the battle of Toba-Fushimi, Yamanami Keisuke at Iwaki
Masuya, Hijikata Tosizo's last battle at Goryokaku, the last battle of Okita
etc...

Tama


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
